page.title: 12THE TOM COBLEY CONTINUED.
page.content: The Tom Cobley is a meeting place and people come from near and far to enjoy themselves.It provides take away foods,bar snacks,bed and breakfast,Sunday lunch barbecues,a room where children can play and many other grown up games such as pool,darts,cards,video games,shove halfpenny,a juke box,boule and fruit machines. You play the fruit machine by putting 10 pence in a slot and then you press the red start button and you can then see three wheels rotating.The wheels have pictures on them and if you see three pictures in a row the same you win some money. Susan and Arthur Courtier have owned the tavern for three years.Before that it was owned by Nora Brookfield,Susan Courtier's mother.
